name: Marco Angelini
description:
'''Marco Angelini''' (26 July 1984) is an [[Austrians|Austrian]] [[singer]] and [[songwriter]] who withdrew from public life in 2014 and started working as a [[Physician|doctor]]. 
Marco Angelini was born in [[Voitsberg|Voitsburg]], [[Styria]], Austria, to an Austrian mother and a Luxembourgish father.
He has been in a relationship with dancer Maria Santner since 2014.
